resources.string: Completed on-campus courses and currently taking distance education courses to complete a Master\'s Degree in Computer Science in MAHARISHI INTERNATIONAL UNIVERSITY and working as full time W2 employee in COOLSOFT.

Language: C#, JAVA 
 Frameworks/web: HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, TypeScript, jQuery, AJAX, Kendo UI, jQuery, Angular Material Design 
 Web services: REST API, SOAP 

Frameworks: NET Core, Spring Boot, Angular 
 Databases: MS SQL 
 Design Patterns: Strategy, Observer, Decorator, Factory, Abstract Factory, Singleton, Command, Adapter, Façade, Template 
 SDLC: Agile-Scrum 
 Tools: VS Code, Visual Studio, IntelliJ, Eclipse, JIRA, Postman, SSRS, Telerik Reporting, Git, TFS 
 Platforms: Windows, Mac OS

Dynamic full stack application developer with 8+ years of hands-on experience designing, developing, and implementing software solutions using a range of technologies and programming languages. Able to deliver new and customized functionality using industry-standard coding techniques to create reusable, maintainable modules. Expertise includes languages and tools like C#, Java, TypeScript, JavaScript, jQuery, Angular, .NET, Spring Boot, and MS SQL.
